items.content:
Hi Sebastien, 

Thanks for reaching out. The integration is not related with Events API but with Marketing API, specifically with Lead Gen endpoints. 

The advertiser can directly go to the business API portal and upload the ticket to the Marketing API team in the support section (there is an external athena from Marketing API team). They will address this question:  https://business-api.tiktok.com/portal

Thanks,
Miguel

title: Issue with Lead Gen via API

items.content: Issue with Lead Gen via API

items.label: Does your client have Developer Resources available to support the implementation?
Reason for request: Please briefly describe the help needed for this account.
items.content:
Hi this account is trying to fully imlement the Events API for lead gen. Below is a copy of an email that I have received from them:

Hi Seb,


We're pretty close to going live with the API based leads fetch into our CDP, but I'm facing this odd thing...

Julia submitted a test lead form to the Instant Form with Page ID 7338007614502093064 
Indeed, I can programmatically get to the CSV download and see her submission through these steps:

1. POST request to https://business-api.tiktok.com/open_api/v1.3/page/lead/task/?advertiser_id=6958734353920704513&page_id=7338007614502093064 
This generates a download file prep task, I get for example task_id 7341068182202302753 back. I use it for the next steps:

2. POST request to https://business-api.tiktok.com/open_api/v1.3/page/lead/task/?advertiser_id=6958734353920704513&task_id=7341068182202302753 just to check it has gone from Running to Succeed, which it has. 

3. GET request to https://business-api.tiktok.com/open_api/v1.3/page/lead/task/download/?advertiser_id=6958734353920704513&task_id=7341068182202302753 which ultimately gives me the CSV data. 

That works, it proves Julia's tets lead lead is there, with lead_id 7338042897645732129 

lead_id,created_time,ad_id,ad_name,adgroup_id,adgroup_name,campaign_id,campaign_name,form_id,form_name,email,firstname,surname
7338042897645732129,2024-02-21 15:20:22(UTC+00:00),1791521802427394,NL | Lead ad | Winactie | feb24 | HIGH,1791521790343282,PR | F18-44 excl. email inschrijvers,1791521809016882,MJ_NL_LEAD_TikTok_Leadgeneration_mrt24,7338007614502093064,MJ_NL_Leads_AO_mrt24_test,juliazentjes@gmail.com,Julia,Zentjes

But CSV is not a format we can use, so I want to fetch the lead through the API in the hope to get a JSON response. So I do this:

- GET request to https://business-api.tiktok.com/open_api/v1.3/page/lead/get/?advertiser_id=6958734353920704513&page_id=7338007614502093064 

This fetches a (or all?) leads, but it keeps coming back with this one dummy lead:

{
"code":0,
"message":"OK",
"request_id":"202402291834001738A35D787E7C4DE3BE",
"data":{
"meta_data":{
"ad_name":"test lead: dummy data for ad name",
"page_id":"7338007614502093064",
"lead_id":"0",
"campaign_id":"0",
"adgroup_id":"0",
"create_time":"2024-02-29T18:34:01+00:00",
"adgroup_name":"test lead: dummy data for ad group name",
"ad_id":"0",
"campaign_name":"test lead: dummy data for campaign name"
},
"lead_data":{
"firstname":"Jane",
"surname":"Doe",
"email":"test_email_address@mail.com"
}
}
}

Note that it has lead_id 0 which I cannot delete:

- POST request to https://business-api.tiktok.com/open_api/v1.3/page/lead/delete/ with advertiser_id and lead_id:0 in the body gets me "Not Found" result. 

Mock Leads I generated I can delete by true lead_id but this one always has lead_id 0 and I cannot get rid of it. It seems to be ahead of Julia's true submission but not in the CSV. 

In the documentation as well as by trial and error I find no API endpoint to retrieve a singular lead by ID. 

The above clearly shows that for Page ID 7338007614502093064 there is one test lead submission waiting to be downloaded. The CSV shows it. But /page/lead/get/?advertiser_id=6958734353920704513&page_id=7338007614502093064 never seems to be able to retrieve it, only ever presenting the system dummy lead. 

If I swap advertiser_id for library_id, it complains about permissions: "message": "You don't have permission to view this form. No permission to access lead data. no permission to access lead data",

Mock leads work fine from creation to retrieval to deletion, all via JSON so easily handled and processed into our CDP. But Production leads, no joy in retrieving!

Can someone see why it's not returning the lead with lead_id 7338042897645732129 with those requests? The CSV route doesn't work for us, we cannot dynamically feed those URLs to our CDP for import. We really need individual or lists of leads via JSON, exactly like how /page/lead/mock/get works since that works perfectly for us.

Kind regards, 

Johan
